/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is teeming with life, lined with a variety of buildings and trees that add a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are scattered along the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, casting a bright light over the scene. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the photograph.
